text: What are some good web resources for learning Object-Oriented Programming?
I've started programming more in OO style than ever (Python).
Any good web resources I could read?
I need help constructing and modelling objects, relations, interfaces etc.
Not only dry theory (I've read that), but something easy to grasp (examples would be nice), do you know any site or a good book?

childList.text: I need help constructing and modelling objects, relations, interfaces etc.
